code: import React from'react';import{Bar}from'react-chartjs-2';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var BarBasicChart=function BarBasicChart(){var data=function data(canvas){var bar=canvas.getContext('2d');var theme_g1=bar.createLinearGradient(0,300,0,0);theme_g1.addColorStop(0,'#4099ff');theme_g1.addColorStop(1,'#73b4ff');var theme_g2=bar.createLinearGradient(0,300,0,0);theme_g2.addColorStop(0,'#2ed8b6');theme_g2.addColorStop(1,'#59e0c5');return{labels:[0,1,2,3],datasets:[{label:"Data 1",data:[25,45,74,85],borderColor:theme_g1,backgroundColor:theme_g1,hoverBorderColor:theme_g1,hoverBackgroundColor:theme_g1},{label:"Data 2",data:[30,52,65,65],borderColor:theme_g2,backgroundColor:theme_g2,hoverBorderColor:theme_g2,hoverBackgroundColor:theme_g2}]};};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{data:data,options:{barValueSpacing:20}});};export default BarBasicChart;
